name: Zendegi
description:
Zendegi (Life) is a historical visual novel set in the Achaemenid Empire (AKA the Persian Empire). You get to play as a woman in that era and make choices that reflect the freedom and autonomy women had at the time in a fun and light-hearted way. Additionally, you get to learn about ancient Persia in general!

Made as an uni project under great duress lol have mercy.
Also my first time making a visual novel/working with ren'py
